'''Michael Graham Cox''' ([[8 January]] [[1938]] - [[30 April]] [[1995]]) was a British actor who voiced the part of [[Boromir]] in [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (1978 film)]]. He would reprise this role in the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' radio series]] broadcast on [[BBC]] Radio 4 in [[1981]].
